item.title: Insurance
item.description: Insurance and Ringing # The following was previously published as a .pdf file on the CCCBR website. This Guidance Note offers advice to individual ringers, ringing organisations, Parochial Church Councils and clergy regarding factors to consider regarding insurance while ringing tower bells and in other issues related to ringing. Most tower bells come under the jurisdiction of the Church of England, so this Guidance Note has been produced with this in mind.
